author: .paulharris
content:
I'm thinking about allowing teku users to query locally submitted bls change operations from our pool... I was originally thinking i'd just provide a teku specific thing, but option b would be having the current operation pool return extra data in its output (non required field) to indicate the item in the pool was locally submitted...
Is there any appetite for that in the standard API to be able to distinguish locally submitted bls operations from non local ones?

author: .paulharris
content: I might even just implement it as a query parameter on the standard endpoint, that'd potentially be a simple option that doesn't return a non-standard output...

author: sproul
content: Lighthouse doesn't keep track of this so we likely wouldn't implement it, but I don't mind if it's an optional query param
